name: ace-context-engineering
description: Agentic Context Engineering system with three-stage FAISS-based curator, AppWorld executor integration, and multi-epoch offline learning. Evolves context through bullets, deltas, and semantic retrieval with TGC/SGC metrics.
author: jmanhype

three_stage_curator.description: Quality-gated curation with structural validation, FAISS deduplication, and final approval

faiss_deduplication.description: Semantic similarity-based duplicate detection using sentence transformers (384-dim embeddings)

appworld_executor.description: Real task execution in AppWorld environment with TGC/SGC metrics
